module.name: Club
module.entry: INSERT INTO club (name, name_short, name_en, name_short_en, code, nationality, extern_id) VALUES (:name, :nameShort, :nameEn, :nameShortEn, :code, :nationality, :externId)
DELETE FROM club WHERE club_id = :id
UPDATE club SET name = :name, name_short = :nameShort, name_en = :nameEn, name_short_en = :nameShortEn, code = :code, nationality = :nationality, extern_id = :externId WHERE club_id = :id
SELECT club_id, name, name_short, name_en, name_short_en, code, nationality, extern_id FROM club

module.name: ClubContent
module.entry: INSERT INTO club_content (club_id, team_id) VALUES (:club_id, :team_id)
DELETE FROM club_content WHERE club_id = :club_id AND team_id = :team_id
SELECT team.team_id, team.name FROM club_content INNER JOIN team ON club_content.team_id = team.team_id WHERE club_id = :club_id
SELECT team.team_id, team.name FROM club_content INNER JOIN team ON club_content.team_id = team.team_id WHERE NOT club_id = :club_id

module.name: Team
module.entry: INSERT INTO team (name) VALUES (:name)
DELETE FROM team WHERE team_id = :id
UPDATE team SET name = :name WHERE team_id = :id
SELECT team_id, name FROM team

module.name: SetFocus
module.entry: INSERT INTO set_focus (name, abbr, notes) VALUES (:name, :abbr, :notes)
UPDATE set_focus SET name = :name, abbr = :abbr, notes = :notes WHERE focus_id = :id
DELETE FROM set_focus WHERE focus_id = :id
SELECT focus_id, name, abbr, notes FROM set_focus

module.name: SetForm
module.entry: INSERT INTO set_form (name, abbr, notes) VALUES (:name, :abbr, :notes)
UPDATE set_form SET name = :name, abbr = :abbr, notes = :notes WHERE form_id = :id
DELETE FROM set_form WHERE form_id = :id
SELECT form_id, name, abbr, notes FROM set_form

module.name: Sets
module.entry: INSERT INTO sets (name, content, distance_f1, distance_f2, distance_f3, intensity, focus_id, form_id, notes, interval, is_pause) VALUES (:name, :content, :distance1, :distance2, :distance3, :intensity, :focus_id, :form_id, :notes, :interval, :is_pause)

UPDATE sets SET name = :name, content = :content, distance_f1 = :distance1, distance_f2 = :distance2, distance_f3 = :distance3, intensity = :intensity, focus_id = :focus_id, form_id = :form_id, notes = :notes, interval = :interval, is_pause = :is_pause WHERE set_id = :id
DELETE FROM sets WHERE set_id = :id

SELECT set_id, sets.name, content, distance_f1, distance_f2, distance_f3, intensity, set_focus.focus_id, set_focus.name as focus_name, set_focus.abbr as focus_abbr, set_focus.notes as focus_notes, set_form.form_id, set_form.name as form_name, set_form.abbr as form_abbr, set_form.notes as form_notes, sets.notes, interval, is_pause FROM sets LEFT OUTER JOIN set_focus ON sets.focus_id = set_focus.focus_id LEFT OUTER JOIN set_form ON sets.form_id = set_form.form_id
